mapper.select: /* 자동증가코드 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN CONCAT(#{column}, '_1') ELSE CONCAT(#{column},'_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${column}, CONCAT(#{column}, '_'), -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS newCode FROM ${table};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_draft_document (draft_doc_num, draft_title, registrant_num, report_date, draft_contents, draft_deadline, approval_final_state) VALUES (#{draftDocNum}, #{draftTitle}, #{registrantNum}, NOW(), #{draftContents}, #{draftDeadline}, '결재진행중')

INSERT INTO tb_approval_line (approval_line_num, draft_doc_num, approval_member_num) VALUES
(sf_approvalLineNum(), #{item.draftDocNum}, #{item.approvalMemberNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_approval_process AS ap INNER JOIN tb_draft_document AS d ON ap.draft_doc_num = d.draft_doc_num WHERE ap.reject_date IS NOT NULL;
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_draft_document SET approval_final_state='결재반려' WHERE draft_doc_num=#{draftDocNum};
mapper.select: /* 결재 완료 목록 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_draft_document AS d INNER JOIN tb_approval_process AS ap ON d.draft_doc_num = ap.draft_doc_num WHERE approval_final_state = '결재완료' AND process_status = '승인';
/* 개별 기안문서 상세보기 */ SELECT * FROM tb_draft_document AS d LEFT JOIN tb_approval_process AS ap ON d.draft_doc_num = ap.draft_doc_num WHERE d.draft_doc_num = #{draftDocNum};
/* 반려 기안문서 상세보기 */ SELECT * FROM tb_draft_document AS d INNER JOIN tb_approval_process AS ap ON d.draft_doc_num = ap.draft_doc_num WHERE d.draft_doc_num = #{draftDocNum};
